title: Chintz
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordant for 2 reds and black applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist. Yellow applied over blue for green (chintz).
description: Design of vines and flowers. The outer parts of the design are vertically symmetrical; the central motifs are not. Indian adaption of a European woven fabric.
name: Chintz
